author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Riot Platforms Boosts Bitcoin Output to 514 BTC as Hashrate and Expansion Plans Ramp Higher
description: The bitcoin miner also advanced plans to build massive data centers in Texas to support AI workloads.
content: Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms (RIOT) reported on Tuesday strong production growth in May, mining 514 BTC an 11% increase from April and a 139% jump compared to the year-ago level. The company sold nea… [+1092 chars]
